answers.answer: A boy :)Its so exciting. Do you know the gender?
Congratulations!Just out of curiosity, when did your ob send you for the gestational diabetes testing?
Mine gave me the option to go in anytime in December so i was just seeing if it was about the same for others.
Yes. Its fine. You have to be a certain amount of weeks in order to get it done in a timely manner.
Yeah pregnancy is definitely a trip. This is my first. So sometimes its easy to dwell and get upset for no reason. Google does not help either. Lol
Your right.Every pregnancy is different, so google wouldnt help much. But this is my second. I learned alot through Birthing Classes.
I'm due March 12the with a girl. :)

question: Just curious if anyone else out there is.
title: Anyone due March 24th?
